edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.poker

Class PokerGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.poker.PokerGame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PokerGameGui

    public class PokerGame
extends Object
    Class that represents a Texas Holdem' Style Poker Game.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PokerGame.Step
      enum representing the game step
      static class  PokerGame.Turn
      enum representing which player's turn it is
      static class  PokerGame.Winner
      enum representing the game winner

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeTurn()
      Method to pass the turn from opponent to player, or player to opponent Must be overridden!!!

      This state is for the turn Purpose is to be overriden in PokerClient

      Function that transfers winnings to a player
      void determineWinner()
      Method to determine the winner of the game
      void fold()
      PlayerDelegate method handles folding

      Returns an ImageIcon by using the URL class in order to make the ImageIcon web compatible

      Method used to advance the game from each step to the next.
      void setUp()
      Sets up the player's and opponent's hand.
      void showWinnerAlert()

        public void changeTurn()
        Method to pass the turn from opponent to player, or player to opponent Must be overridden!!!

      • nextStep

        public void nextStep()
        Method used to advance the game from each step to the next. Specifically, in the order Blind-Flop-Turn-River-Showdown

      • checkPassTurnUpdate

        protected void checkPassTurnUpdate()
        This state is for the turn Purpose is to be overriden in PokerClient

      • showWinnerAlert

        public void showWinnerAlert()
        Method shows winner and exits game. Overridden to actually do stuff in children
